Articles.Content: Who's Calehan?
so, all this time...you had every opportunity to just end my life...

SELF DESTRUCT SEQUENCE INITIATED IN 3..... 2..... 1...... 

I hop hop in an escape pod and head for Laythe

> 
> so, all this time...you had every opportunity to just end my life...

Why would I do that? It's no fun playing with a dead person.

> 
> Who's Calehan?

[A senior engineer aboard Sampa's crew]
Computer, cancel that! Administrative override \*inserts administrative key\*

DENIED

Haha
\*sighs\* C-Sec is gonna love THIS...

I have Alpha class clearance while you have only Beta! Muahahahahaha

- - - Updated - - -

Kaboom!
Excuse me, \*hacks the computer and disconnects the self-destruct\*
I arrive at Laythe, but crash land in the Ocean and drown to death

> 
> I have Alpha class clearance while you have only Beta! Muahahahahaha
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Kaboom!

And I don't need any!

**Deploys 011 perimeter to compress the explosion at it's source**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹
(and another famous Laythe Kamikaze)
Yay I'm insane *and* Ã¢â‚¬â€¹dead!
\*sighs\* Why do I always get the crazy crews and missions...? \*facepalm\*
Everyone in the galaxy cheers for my death

> 
> \*sighs\* Why do I always get the crazy crews and missions...? \*facepalm\*

Because you have me! Well... Kinda... In a way.

Creepy

- - - Updated - - -

Sampa carried around your dead body... CREEPY.... VERY CREEPY
\*laughs\* I guess you're right. I never thought I'd say this, but, I'm kind of glad you're on our side...you ARE on our side, this time, right?

> 
> \*laughs\* I guess you're right. I never thought I'd say this, but, I'm kind of glad you're on our side...you ARE on our side, this time, right?

Hey, the enemy of my enemy is my friend, right?

**Activates charm implant**
It's like quantum physics: Ya never know until it happens

> 
> Creepy
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Sampa carried around your dead body... CREEPY.... VERY CREEPY

not as creepy as you having a penchant for going kamikaze every 10 minutes

Where is the *Discovery*Ã¢â‚¬â€¹?

- - - Updated - - -

This time I'm actually dead

> 
> Hey, the enemy of my enemy is my friend, right?
> **Activates charm implant**

\*laughs\* I guess you're right.

By the way, you KNOW that charm won't work...\*teasingly\* unless I want it to, of course!

Oh come here and hug me! Resistance is futile this time!

**Amps it up to full power**

> 
> \*laughs\* I guess you're right.
> By the way, you KNOW that charm won't work...\*teasingly\* unless I want it to, of course!

Creeeeepy

- - - Updated - - -

\*cough cough\* Ya know, I'm dead here.....
